forest_clearing.name: Forest Clearing
forest_clearing.description: A hush clings to this ring of grass where the forest parts. Sunlight pours in dusty shafts, dragonflies stitch lazy circles over wildflowers, and a lichen-cloaked stone table waits like an altar to forgotten picnics.

manor.name: Manor
manor.description: A modest manor crouches behind an overgrown garden, ivy fingering its stone like old script. Wind chimes tinkle somewhere unseen, and the brass door knocker is polished by countless anxious hands.

foyer.name: Foyer
foyer.description: Dust hangs in sunbeams over a scuffed table and a solitary chair. An oil portrait watches from the wall, and to the east a glass door glimmers like still water.

Garden.name: Garden
Garden.description: A small garden with a few flowers and a few trees. A few flowers are blooming, and a few trees are growing.

dark_cave_entrance.name: Dark Cave Entrance
dark_cave_entrance.description: Your breath turns to mist at the caveâ€™s lip. The smell of wet stone and old iron seeps out in slow, cool waves, and somewhere inside a drip measures time with patient clicks.

goblins_lair.name: Goblin's Lair
goblins_lair.description: A reeking den of tallow smoke and sour ale. Greasy fetishes dangle from the ceiling, bones and gnawed boots strewn like trophies across the dirt.

dungeon_cell_1.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 1
dungeon_cell_1.description: A cramped cell of sweating stone. Rust-sick bars weep orange tears, and shallow tally marks bite into the walls in restless rows.

dungeon_cell_2.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 2
dungeon_cell_2.description: Mildew breathes from the stones, sweet and stale. Water gathers in a corner with patient plinks, and faint chittering drifts from deeper halls.

dungeon_cell_3.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 3
dungeon_cell_3.description: Splintered bones pop beneath your boots like old twigs. A scurrying shadow retreats just beyond the reach of your gaze.

dungeon_cell_4.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 4
dungeon_cell_4.description: Water drips from the ceiling into a shallow, murky puddle.

dungeon_cell_5.name: Goblin Dungeon - Cell 5
dungeon_cell_5.description: A wider chamber lit by a guttering torch. Something watches you.

shack_shop.name: Shack Shop
shack_shop.description: A small, cozy shack with a large table and chair. There is a large glass door to the east.

village_square.name: Village Square
village_square.description: A quaint village square with a stone well and a few benches. Villagers pass by, chatting quietly.

params.npc_description: leans on a walking stick, ready to chat.
